verbose_text: Having established that eIF4E protein levels steadily decline during aging (XREF_FIG F) and that downregulation of key mRNA decapping components influences eIF4E abundance in somatic C. elegans tissues (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY L), we set out to examine whether these changes are mediated by DAF-16, SKN-1, or HSF-1, which are known for their roles in proteostasis maintenance.
